website_summaries.verdict: A dry shampoo made specifically for oily hair. Paraben- and sulphate-free and usable on color-treated hair.
pros: Freshens hair up by soaking up oil
Helps to create body and shine without ugly white residue
Formula is lightweight and has a nice scent
cons: The can doesn't last long and some may need to brush in the product

customer_reviews.title: I am shocked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this not expecting much. I have tried tons and tons of dry shampoos and none have really made much of a difference. This was no exception but I wanted to try it anyway. Boy. This stuff is amazing. The instant it touched my hair, BAM, no more oil. It made my hair super soft to boot. I have insanely oily hair after a day without washing and in day 3 this really did make my hair feel like I had just washed it. 10 stars my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dry Shampoo!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very new to using dry shampoo. I've had a few samples to try through my beauty box subscriptions. I received a sample of Klorane and was so very impressed with its performance!! This has been the only dry shampoo that doesn't leave any type of white residue on your hair and it doesn't weigh your hair down. It has a very pleasant scent to it, it gets rid of the oiliness I get and actually gives my hair some bounce and volume without stickiness/tackiness. This is by far the best dry shampoo I've tried. I'll be sticking with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: NR

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Klorane for some years now and tried this new version. I like it more as it gives a cleaner effect. I spray it before bedtime and the next day there is no white residue at all. My hair is very thin and oily and this keeps it "clean" and with shape for 3 days or more. Love it and could not live without it.
customer_reviews.author: gis fitz

customer_reviews.title: Literally 3 Uses for $10
customer_reviews.text: I like this product overall especially since it doesn't have an overpowering scent like the other dry shampoos I've tried. My issue with this is that I only got 3 uses out of it, in other words, $3+ per use! Absolutely ridiculous and not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: VioletK

customer_reviews.title: this is THE best dry shampoo I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: this is THE best dry shampoo I have ever used. I have normal ish hair but my roots are more oily while the ends are dry and prone to split ends. usually I can't tolerate more than 2 days without a wash, and all the other dry shampoo brands I've tried before have done the job to make my hair look decent but honestly leave my scalp feeling gunky and gross. this product, however, helps me seriously extend time in between washes and leaves my head feeling actually clean and fresh. also, I really like that it doesn't have much of a scent to it. this will be my go-to from now on, for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo I have found, but not enough in the can
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I have excessively oily hair, and I almost always have to wash it daily, or it is slicked back with oil. I have been testing many different brands over the course of my life, and landed on this as the best. No white cast once rubbed in, no heavy feeling, and you don't look like you have dry shampoo in. My only issue is the amount you get per can. I will use this every other day, and it will run out by the 10-12th use. That's about $20/month. I wish they made a jumbo sized one, so I can go longer in between buying them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing and relieving, Best Dry Shampoo on the Market in a convenient Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: The best dry shampoo on the market in my opinion. I use it to refresh my scalp and it makes it feel so much better. This can be particularly challenging due to the trichotillomania I deal with. If my scalp feels oily or irritated a day after showering, a few blasts of this and it feels so much better. I keep a travel size bottle like this one in my bag, as well as my locker at work. It is a little expensive per ounce, but I feel it's worth it- it's one of my essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible rash!!
customer_reviews.text: The third time I used this I broke out in a horrible red rash all along my hairline and back of my neck and around my ears! Now I’m itching and practically bathing in hydrocortisone cream. I do not have sensitive skin and rarely have allergic reactions. Don’t waste your money on this one!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Sticking to Batiste.
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine and abundant hair, bob length. I wash my hair ever 2-3 days and I recently had a baby. I read up on this item and wanted to treat myself to a nicer product to help myself out between washes. I like the Klorane products for fine hair; I really wanted to like this product. Unfortunately, I didn't really see any benefit over the cheaper alternatives. Not only is this more than 3x the cost for less product, I feel like the drug store versions did a better job. Subsequently, I found myself using more product, and it ran out even faster. I will be sticking to Batiste Fresh and Clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn R

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! Unlike many other dry shampoos
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Unlike many other dry shampoos, this one is very light and does not leave a residue; which is very important since I have dark hair. However, I was very disappointed because I got maybe 4 uses out of this can. That's a hefty price for 4 uses. Unless, I got a defective can. I did like it so much that I thought about purchasing the full size, but a bit hesitant due to the price and amount of use I got it.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: This is the best. I've tried the rest including some very expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. I've tried the rest including some very expensive well-loved products, but this is the one that works on my fine hair. Without dry shampoo I really feel I have to wash my hair daily because even by the end of day one, it's getting greasy. With Klorane (I use both types - Nettle on the first day, the Oat Milk on each day thereafter) I can go three days without washing my hair, four if it really comes down to it.
customer_reviews.author: Edith L. Wentz

customer_reviews.title: Drying to scalp, does suck up oiliness, bottle doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: So the good: this product isn't heavily fragranced like most dry shampoos. I tried a Dove branded one the other day and just about gagged each time my hair moved. The smell on this one is almost non-existent. It does indeed suck up all the oil and does not leave my hair still feeling dirty. Both the Batiste and Dove left my hair still feeling gross. The bad: even after brushing, there is still a slight powdery effect to my roots, so it does not look like freshly washed, shiny hair. Also, I only got 8-9 full uses out of this bottle, so that's $2.50 each use. Not worth the $20 cost per bottle.
customer_reviews.author: S L

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: My 5 dollar Batiste is still the best overall. Living Proof is more effective but not enough to justify the added expense. And this stuff doesn't work at all, makes my hair texture strange and leaves build up. Total waste of money. I forgot to return it in time, and now I'm stuck with it. The only one worse than this one is the charcoal one I tried... Save your money. The drug store stuff is much better. Just make sure you get a good clarifying routine to get rid of any build-up.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsyreader

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: First let's talk about the size here.. There's enough for one use. $10 for one time?! The texture feels gritty and odd in my hair and it does nothing to decrease the amount of oil in my hair. If anything, it weighed it down. I was surprised considering this is the oily version. I would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Shampoo on the Market!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried dozens of dry shampoos in my lifetime and allot and far surpasses any other dry shampoo out there! It’s great for blind or brunette hair as it just melts into roots and brushes through well with just your finger tips. I can go several days between my washes simply by using this dry shampoo. Does well to provide a clean feeling even by day 3! It’s great and I highly recommend it. I am blonde with incredibly thick shoulder length hair. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Good. Worth $20? Maybe not.
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of dry shampoo, so if I'm going to use a luxury product, it better be worth it. This works very well, has a surprisingly good spray design (it's easy to control how much comes out), and has a nice, non-powdery finish. Despite its cosmetic elegance, I don't think it's worth the price. If it were $10, maybe. But Batiste or Dove for less than a quarter of the price means much more bang for my buck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is the absolute best of the best in dry shampoo!!!!! My Daughter has oily hair and I am trying to have her stop washing it everyday so the oil production slows down. She plays volleyball as well. She has been able to go without washing up to 3 days with her long hair! This product may be a bit more expensive but it is really worth it! You don’t have a powdery scalp, it smells good, and doesn’t make your hair feel weird!
customer_reviews.author: Svobs

customer_reviews.title: Hair saver
customer_reviews.text: I have tried more dry shampoos than I can count. Washing my hair every day left my hair dried out. And the time I spent drying it was just too much. I originally tried the dark brown color dry shampoo they also sell, but that is harder to find so I tried this one after not being able to get more. This stuff works really well and honestly blends into my dark hair well enough where I don’t need it to be colored. It helps me go two to three days without washing my hair; which makes my hair so much softer.
customer_reviews.author: AmznJunkieX

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair feel genuinely clean
customer_reviews.text: Best dry shampoo ever! My hair feels actually clean and not sticky/powdery after using it. I have thinner hair and by the end of the day it already started to look oily. I wanted to cut down on how much I am washing my hair and I’ve tried many different brands of dry shampoo. This genuinely makes my hair feel and look like I just washed it, no powder residue at all. I do use it at night and let it soak in overnight which I think also helps with any residue
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best summer dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t want metals in your spray this isn’t for you. If you DO want ‘hair antiperspirant’ this is your holy grail. Those metals are the same in your under arm product. Just hold your breath, spray, walk to a different room, and brush it out in 2 minutes. So much less sweat in the summer and your hair can last 2-3 days extra, easy. Happily makes my day 2 and 3 hair look great. I have a thick head of very thin, faintly wavy hair. That means a ton of pores. And a ton of sweat. I. Love. This. Product.
customer_reviews.author: KaliaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Upkeep between shampoos
customer_reviews.text: I have thin dirty blonde hair, and even when I'm not sweating, I can look a little greasy if I go more than 24 hours without shampooing. I have tried and number of products and Bumble & Bumble had my last favorite, but it was more expensive than I liked and could leave some residue. Klorane works perfectly, easy on, absorbs quickly, and makes my roots look fresh. A can seems to last better than the B&B with easier application (less brushing/blending).
customer_reviews.author: Melle12

customer_reviews.title: Oily hair: get the green cap (nettle)
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for about a year. One time I experimented and got the Oat Milk, but that did almost nothing for my oily hair. The nettle one is absolutely perfect, best dry shampoo I've ever used. Definitely worth the price, any drug store option I've tried couldn't even compare. I have really oily hair, and if we call the morning I wash my hair Day 1, then by Day 3 Morning I would need to use this. For Day 3 it's perfect and I actually tend to get more hair compliments than on Days 1 and 2. However by Day 3 Night my hair feels super greasy so I always wash it by Day 4.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: My fav
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite dry shampoo. I have tried quite a few but this with the Nettle works wonders. I have fine, limp, long hair. It is oily the day after shampooing. I use this on the day after a shampoo. It goes on white but dissipates nicely. There is no build up and it washes out very easily. There is no smell, I wish there was a slight one, but nope. The only draw back on this is the price for the size. It is one of the smallest quantities but has the highest price per oz of all the ones I have tried. I still love it and it is worth the splurge.
customer_reviews.author: femme246

customer_reviews.title: Very light!  Works well!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I have both the oatmeal and nettle. also original use the powder form which didn’t spray out consistently, but absorbs well. No residue and doesn’t get gunky feeling even when using multiple times. I kind of like the powder before bed to really absorb oil and the spray for morning. Let’s me go a day or two between shampoos which I’ve never been able to do. My hair looks good and doesn’t feel greasy- even if it doesn’t feel fly away clean.
customer_reviews.author: Winegirl

customer_reviews.title: Some kind of awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love klorane dry shampoo. My hair looks plastered by the evening and I tried drybar, batiste, some other random stuff... Harvey whatever...klorane is the only one that works. The nettle one takes it a whole different level, my hair is acceptable on the third day after washing it. Amazing. I spray as some other reviewer said, first at night and then again a bit in the morning. In other words, don’t let it go bad. And spray from 10 inches away, it does make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer 20201

customer_reviews.title: Been using this for years!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have naturally oily, straight hair. If I want to go one day between washing, I use this spray. It gives a little lift while absorbing the oils. it doesn't leave any white residue on my very dark brown hair. i think batiste may work slightly better but the scent is overwhelming. with the other brand, i smelled like old lady perfume.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, if you can afford it
customer_reviews.text: For fine, dark blonde, oily hair, this is THE BEST dry shampoo I've ever had. It's just so darn expensive compared to other brands. --gentle on scalp and hair (and I am very sensitive to dry shampoos) --smells fine, not too strong --applies easily --brushes out easily --styles really well If money is not an issue, this is the perfect product for dark blonde, fine, oily hair. If you're on a budget, maybe get one can for special/emergency occasions?
customer_reviews.author: A B

customer_reviews.title: My holy Grail of Dry Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: A stumbled upon this when looking for a replacement with my old dry shampoo. My hair is thick heavy Asian hair that gets oily after a day of wash and I couldn't find a dry shampoo that didn't make my hair even oiler until this one. This one is HANDS DOWN the only one that keeps my oils at bay all day and will actually add volume too. I've been using it for a few years now and I'm afraid to try anything else. I do think it's expensive and even $18 would be more reasonable than 20 considering how much I use this stuff, but it's so good I don't dare leave it.
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: My favorite dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have blonde hair and this is my favorite dry shampoo that I have ever used. It is on the more expensive side as far as dry shampoos go but it’s so worth it. After you brush it through it’s completely invisible and gives great volume and texture to the hair without feeling heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great for very oily hair
customer_reviews.text: Most dry shampoos don’t really last in my oily hair. This does spray on very white and powdery but I am able to rub it in pretty well. You don’t get a huge bottle for the price. But, it really does work. Best I’ve found yet for fine and oily hair. Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because of the White you have to work in.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Shaw

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have fine blond hair that gets oily fast and I have tried every dry shampoo under the sun, at every price range from drug store batiste to Oribe, Ouai et al. This is by far the best although it does not last long otherwise I’d give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: I USED to love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product for a few months now and I DID love it. But the last two cans have come in a different colored bottle and for whatever reason the drying power of this new stuff is crap and does nothing. If you get the white bottle with green lettering, this stuff works amazingly well, but the blueish colored can stuff is awful. I probably won’t buy again since it appears the blueish cam is the new one they are sending. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra E. Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff, it has no odor which is great and takes care of that access oil without damaging the hair. I would have given it 5 stars except it really doesn't last very long and it feels very wasteful to constantly be throwing out that bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Best. Dry. Shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried countless dry shampoos and this is my FAVORITE. It does not have a strong smell which I love because all of the others are so strong it’s nauseating. It also has minimal white residue and no stiffness at all. When I use it my hair is as fresh and clean as if I just washed it. Love this and highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: KAB

customer_reviews.title: Klorane Dry Shampoo is the Best Dry Shampoo Available!
customer_reviews.text: Klorane Dry Shampoo is the best dry shampoo I've found! And I've tried a lot. It's easy to use, no flaking, no powdery feel or residue, holds up all day, smells good, etc Wish they would make a super sized container though! It doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.author: William E. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to, I really like it!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times. I read where others felt it scorched their hair if using a flat iron, etc after using this product, so I have been using my flat iron, THEN I use this dry shampoo afterwards. I don't see any residue, and it seems to keep my hair looking good all day! (I am fair-haired, so maybe that helps with the fact that no residue shows.) Will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I really love this dry shampoo. I have very light and wispy hair and a lot of it. My hair is a bit wavy sometimes and usually a frizzy mess. Most hair products are very heavy on my hair and leave it looking flat or greasy. This is very light on my hair and leaves my hair looking clean and full of life. It’s my favorite dry shampoo, though I do still like Batiste dry shampoo a bit more, but only because it’s significantly cheaper and also gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: This is the only dry shampoo that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine, oily hair and have NEVER been able to skip a day of washing my hair without it looking like an oily mess until I found this dry shampoo! It really works! I now only have to wash my hair every other day. I LOVE it. I also just got their oil control regular shampoo too. The dry shampoo isn't cheap...and I go through about 1 can a month...but for me it is totally worth it to only have to deal with washing/drying/styling my hair every other day. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not made for my fine hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very fine hair but I have lots of it. I have tried multiple times to find a dry shampoo that will work on my fine hair that has to be washed every day. I did my research and chose to try the Klorane Dry Shampoo. Unfortunately it left me with the same heavy product build-up as all the other products I had tried. This may work for people with thicker hair but it did nothing for my fine hair except make it feel heavy and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Tia M.

customer_reviews.title: New favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This dry shampoo is amazing! It’s so soft and light weight, and absorbs the oil very well. It’s almost like a dry powder, not wet and sticky, or thick and crunchy, like other dry shampoos. The smell is a very light scent, unlike all others I have ever tried.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: All other dry shampoos can go home
customer_reviews.text: This is it! This is the winner! Finally I've found a dry shampoo that can tackle my thin, fine, greasy hair. I've gone through tons of different dry shampoos and this is by far the winner. My hair was greasy from coconut oil this morning and I sprayed this on, now it's full of body and doesn't look stringy or greasy whatsoever. I also have almost black hair and was not bothered by white/grey appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: NEW FAVORITE
customer_reviews.text: I liked the other version of this product quite a bit but this stuff is fantastic! I have oily hair and I wondered why people were so obsessed with dry shampoo. Now that I've found the right one, I totally understand. This is a new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bangs
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this between washes to remove oils from my bangs. I've had no issues with the white powder, as I will tease my bangs with a comb until any residue is gone. I would not suggest this for use over the entire scalp, as the amount of product is limited. It's been great to keep a smaller canister in my travel bag as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lance

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: My tween son has very thick oily hair and is at an age where he resists washing his hair as often as he need it. This dry shampoo has put an end to the arguments and the hassle of frequent wet shampoos. It works really well, too, keeps the oil under control for at least 4 days. Great stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenza

customer_reviews.title: BEST DRY SHAMPOO EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have used so many dry shampoos over the last few years. By FAR the best I have ever used. I put on before bed and in the morning wake up with clean looking hair! My hair feels clean too, not dry and dusty like other brands give you. Will forever repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I primarily use this on my bangs and it's fantastic. Unless you really layer it on
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use this on my bangs and it's fantastic. Unless you really layer it on, there's no dully powdery residue even after brushing, and the smell dissipates pretty quickly. Great for freshening up bangs in a hurry!
customer_reviews.author: christine

customer_reviews.title: Just does not work well
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by one of my favorite beauty bloggers and her advice is typically spot on. Not this time! I’m fine paying extra for a product that delivers but this falls flat.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Robinson

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dry shampoo I've used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo I've used, has plenty of product and actually makes a difference in what my hair looks like without making it super gritty. It works well as a texturizer/volumizer, but there are other products that do that job specifically that I'd recommend more if you were looking for that. If you're looking for cleaning power, easy use, and a good amount of product, this is your dry shampoo!
customer_reviews.author: MoWeezy

customer_reviews.title: Klorane Dry Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Because I rolled the genetic short straw on scalps, I have thin hair that lacks volume and is prone to oiliness. For this reason, I quite like dry shampoo. I usually use Batiste products but thought I'd give this a shot, even though it was much more expensive. To me, it hasn't really been worth it. I feel like it doesn't control oil as long, doesn't blend in as well, and leaves a surprisingly thick buildup on my scalp that I feel compelled to rinse at night. Guess this one just isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent, but a little disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product in the past and liked the gentle scent. Also, it didn't irritate my eyes like the usual commercial smelly ones do. Not sure if the formula changed, but this time around, it made my hair stiff, and the hair went flat with an hour after use. Also, it's a little pricey for the relatively small number of applications.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannnie Drew

customer_reviews.title: Residue
customer_reviews.text: ARE YOU KIDDING ME? I’ve used a lot of dry shampoos , and I’ve had a lot of residue from dry shampoos ... but this is CRAZY !! I can’t believe it , I look 75! Now I have to re wet and fix my hair , which if I’m not mistaken the point of dry shampoo is to not do that. I would give 0 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo for Oily hair
customer_reviews.text: The best dry shampoo on the market for oily hair. The only solution to not washing everyday. It can leave white residue but I don’t mind because it works so well and you can brush it out.
customer_reviews.author: N.Meck

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry shampoo , Hands down!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best dry hair shampoo I have tried and I have tried them all. The smell is not to bad and it does not dry your hair out . I suggest using it on the roots only. It will leave a whitish tint at first but just brush it through your hair and add a little oil through the ends and you are good to go. It also gives great volume . I have bleached hair so I can not shampoo my hair but once a week and this keeps my hair 100% clean when it starts to look a tad oily !
customer_reviews.author: janeo

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I have sort oily hair and typical dry shampoo just makes my hair look cakey. This stuff worked great, gave my hair body and very, very minimal residue. Unfortunately, this product comes in a small bottle and doesn't last long, making it too expensive for me to keep using. I have shoulder length hair and the bottle only lasted a week and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Lacour

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for greasy hair
customer_reviews.text: My hair gets greasy very easily and this is the perfect solution for it. I keep ordering it. The only negative thing I could say about it is that the product finishes super quickly. Tip: If you put too much of the product or if you spray too closely you’ll end up with a powdery look but you can easily fix it with a blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thankful to have found this <3
customer_reviews.text: After giving up completely on dry shampoo, I finally found exactly what works for me! For the first time, I was able to go a second day without washing my hair and this stuff not only blended into my dark brown hair without residue, but sucked up the oil on my scalp like none other. It literally looked like I’d just washed it! Also- no white mist hanging in the air like that Batiste brand.. perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Clutter-free

customer_reviews.title: It's pricey, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Just got into the dry shampoo game as I grew my hair out. I've tried and few others, 5 dollar variety, and they were what I paid for. Decent price, decent job. But when I want it done right, I use this. If you follow the instructions, it does a great job. It literally feels very clean after I brush it out, and I have very fine, tends to get greasy hair. This is the good stuff
customer_reviews.author: Mike H.

customer_reviews.title: Best acting dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite dry shampoo by a wide margin. It works very well and doesn't have a strong scent. The only downside is it seems to run out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to be a regular travel size spray instead it is smaller than my hand. I can cover my whole hand under it. It works fine, but not worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Smelly
customer_reviews.text: It smells terrible, smells super chemically! Also, it is a bit confusing, and I ordered a 1 oz bottle for 9 dollars, with no returns! It wouldn't be as bad if it was amazing, but it doesn't feel any different than what I normally use, and it has the added horrible smell. Not impressed and definitely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been searching for a dry shampoo that leaves the hair soft and oily free. I found that in this product. This product is great, it leaves the hair soft, takes away the oil and there is no residue. Been using it for 5 months, wont change to other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Catalina Maroto

customer_reviews.title: I only buy this dry shampoo!!!
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but the best dry shampoo out there. It will literally make your hair look like it’s just been freshly washed - no white residue, no stickiness or loss of volume.
customer_reviews.author: Tisa Segovic

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite dry shampoo ever - and I've tried them all
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite dry shampoo ever - and I've tried them all! It works best for me when I spray it at the roots before going to bed when I know I won't wash my hair the next day. When I wake up, I brush through it and hit my hair with the hairdryer for a few minutes - and I'm good as new!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie R

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly the same as you can buy in a drug store for $5. I got the same result as using the cheap stuff. Based on the reviews and things I have read online, I expected higher quality. But this does not really work for my oily hair. Sorry I wasted $20.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: best dry shampoo for oily hair
customer_reviews.text: my hair is naturally oily and it is colored and highlighted and this is the best dry shampoo I have ever used. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Padykula

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Product
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with this dry shampoo. I only wish it was more affordable! This is the only dry shampoo that works really well and does not feel like a lot of product in your hair. I have tried many brands and this one is the clear winner.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: White residue!
customer_reviews.text: I’m on the search for a great dry shampoo and while this one was on the expensive side I decided to give it a try. It left a terrible white residue that took a while to fade out and flaked terrible. I’m very upset with this purchase and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works quickly, leaves no residue, there's gotta be a mini-wizard in it to work this perfectly, I swear.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dry shampoo that actually works. I've tried others that add smelly gunk into my hair that's sticky and nasty to the point I have to wash it out with water anyway, defeats the purpose of 'dry shampoo' and all. Klorane goes on and does it's job within 1-3 minutes, it's fantastic and always surprises me and leaves me with a smile. It's like magic. I always keep coming back for more.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo I have tried
customer_reviews.text: This is better than the Oat product. It also sprays on clear and dries out white but absorbs more oil. I think its fine to use even if you don't consider your hair to be generally oily - by the time you resort to a dry shampoo, it has oil in it and you want it gone. I am switching to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: This is the best dry shampoo I have used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo I have used, and I have used at least 15-20 in the past few years. It does have a fragrance, but it fades quickly, and it works wonderfully. I have had trouble finding a dry shampoo that works but does not overwhelm me with its fragrance. This is the best out there. It does cost more than drugstore brands, but it is invisible, it works, and it does not make me sick with too much fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: jdykes33

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo out there
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dry shampoo that works on my hair. I went from having to wash my hair daily to washing every three days. What's so great about this is that it doesn't leave my hair feeling dirty like other dry shampoos did.
customer_reviews.author: Darcimi

customer_reviews.title: Best dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dry shampoo I’ve tried. I normally buy it from Sephora but I love that Amazon gets it to me quicker!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: No water
customer_reviews.text: It works It will make your hair white soooo make sure you massage it well in your scalp to get tyhe oil out. Hair feels super managable
customer_reviews.author: sandrine

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on fine oily hair
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this in Birchbox and I love this dry shampoo. It smells good and doesn't make me feel icky with leftover residue. The downside is the price of this, but I splurge on this every now and then. BTW my Hair is fine,Oily and straight.I have tried other brands that you can easily find in you local superstore or pharmacy and you get what you pay for. With fine hair like mine it is very easy to weigh it down and make it look worse than before.
customer_reviews.author: tenshinyc

customer_reviews.title: Wish there were more if it in the can
customer_reviews.text: It’s probably one of the best dry shampoos for fine limo hair. Unfortunately I go through it very fast. I use it between washes (once every 4-5days) and one can barely lasts three weeks. Sad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It makes hair look clean!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how well it actually works! No smell or residue. It gives extra volume, feels a little like a hair spray, but it makes hair look clean (which is the ultimate goal). I ordered the little "sample size", but I'll be re-ordering the bigger bottle next.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. Leaves my hair looking clean and soft without any kind of residue. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mystery_Machine_Gang

customer_reviews.title: Gives volume and eliminates oil
customer_reviews.text: Where has this stuff been all my life? I have thin hair and it gets oily very quickly. It's also colored and I try not to wash it too often. This stuff is perfect for those in between wash days. It gives great volume, soaks up the oil, and doesn't stink. I do notice it leaves a little white residue, but once I brush it through, you can hardly see it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful too expensive
customer_reviews.text: This smells awful and NOT worth the price. Have tried many other products and they work and smell better then this, don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: it does not make my hair feel dirty. I have dark brown hair and it leaves ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried every dry shampoo product out there. This is the only one that after applying it, it does not make my hair feel dirty. I have dark brown hair and it leaves a lot of white residue, but I keep brushing my hair until it disappears. Why dry shampoo products don't make more options besides white powder is beyond me, but they need to! There's brunettes out there that need more products like this! I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Withers

customer_reviews.title: Too FLUFFING EXPENSIVE
customer_reviews.text: This works amazingly and i love it. Lasted a week. Not spending 40 bucks a month on DRY SHAMPOO
customer_reviews.author: TheThompsonMom

customer_reviews.title: Good product, a little over priced
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this a better review but this is a small can, and it’s a little more pricey. I didn’t notice any major flaws with product. It’s just for $16 you can get 3 pack batiste
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but unparalleled in dry shampoo quality
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't smell crazy or look white on your head. It's the most natural feeling, lest itchy dry shampoo I've used. It's more expensive than other options, but I personally hate the other options so much that I will never use them, so I end up washing my hair instead. When you think about how much time you save showering, it's really worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M P

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this dry shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this dry shampoo! It does not have a weird smell and works instantly to lift my fine hair and gives it a clean, ready to go out the door feel.
customer_reviews.author: LVAnn66

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Like it very much for my oily hair. Doesn't leave so much residue. I would say it's a bit overpriced though.
customer_reviews.author: Grace R

customer_reviews.title: I can’t think of a single bad thing to say about this one!
customer_reviews.text: I. Love. This. Dry Shampoo!!! A little goes a long way. I’ve actually noticed less oil production in my hair, which is great because I like to go as long as possible between washes to preserve my bright pink hair. It doesn’t have an unpleasant smell, or leave a bunch of white residue either. I go through dry shampoo like crazy, and I’ve tried countless brands,and as far as effectiveness goes this tops my list!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great Dry Shampoos
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo. Excellent value for the money. Doesn’t have an overwhelming scent yet takes away bed head smell. Gives my hair the fresh look I need. I can use this for three days if necessary which is truly miraculous. Compared to Drybar, Morrocan Oil, Living Proof, Bumble & Bumble.. it’s my favorite hands down. Klorane just doesn’t build up on my scalp like the others.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Solid B+
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work pretty well for me and I’ve tried a lot of dry shampoos. It definitely does leave some white residue but I find it brushes out of my medium brown hair pretty easily. Any remaining powder I work in with my fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I can now shower at night but not look like it.
customer_reviews.text: I used to use Klorane’s non-aerosol dry shampoo because I have greasy hair but the nettle spray works fabuslously and makes my life so much easier when im trying to get ready in the morning. I can now shower at night but not look like it.
customer_reviews.author: ruisseau

customer_reviews.title: Works fairly well
customer_reviews.text: This is my first experience with dry shampoo & it was moderately effective. It required an enormous amount of brushing to get the flakes out of very short fur.
customer_reviews.author: Mardy

customer_reviews.title: I didn't care for this one
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this since I have oily hair, but it barely worked and only lasted for a couple of applications. It's way too expensive for that. The Batiste brand worked much better, but I had the tropical one and the smell was way over powering. I'm trying the Moroccanoil one next. The search goes on!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works well, good for people who want scent free
customer_reviews.text: I got about a 5 uses out of this travel size which is good. It worked well. No residue. There is no scent. Would re-order again.
customer_reviews.author: SMO

customer_reviews.title: simply a classic
customer_reviews.text: best scent, best results. I have dark blonde l and thick hair this is the best dry shampoo I have ever found.

customer_reviews.title: Mehhh...it’s ok/pretty good. Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Small bottle for the price really...works decent but still leaves white marks. Idk how to get away from that unless you buy the colored ones for brunette etc? This one was less sticky than others when I did wash it out.
customer_reviews.author: Boomididit

customer_reviews.title: Really not pleased with this
customer_reviews.text: Really not pleased with this... made my hair feel super icky! I have been using Eva NYC dry shampoo but figured I'd try something a bit "fancier".. well... this bottle was super expensive and made my hair feel disgusting and sticky. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: Just didn’t work for me at all. My hair looked the same - dirty. Perhaps it will work for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many dry shampoos and this is one of my new favorites. Gives amazing volume and I like the scent. I would put it up above Living Proof which is another staple of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff for the in-between days! Not only does it absorb oil, it also adds a bit of body and texture.
customer_reviews.author: May Latte

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive alternative to Furterer
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I usually use a more expensive dry shampoo and found this as a good less expensive alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Fiona M.

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL BARELY GET ANYTHING OUT OF THE CAN
customer_reviews.text: This makes me so mad. The dry shampoo itself is pretty great...but it lasts a hot second. You maybe have 5 good uses out of it, I'm serious. And I don't use a lot. Makes me annoyed at the money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Em B

product_meta.title: Klorane Dry Shampoo with Nettle for Oily Hair and Scalp, Regulates Oil Production, Paraben & Sulfate-Free
product_meta.description:
Size:3.2 OunceRevive and refresh your hair. Klorane Dry Shampoo with Nettle refreshes your hair in-between washes without water and is especially for oily hair. Klorane combines the best of nature with pharmaceutical knowledge to create botanical products suitable for the entire family and continually strives to understand skin and its components while focusing on the benefits of natural ingredients.

BRAND STORY
Hair and face care products forumulated with innovative, safe and efficient plant-based ingredients while respecting and preserving nature
